item.title: About me
item.description: Hi! I am a data advocate whose life calling is to help people take better, smarter and more efficient decisions based on evidence. I have a BSc in Management and Information Systems from the Instituto Tecnológico de Buenos Aires and I am currently reading for the MSc in Analytics and Management at London Business School. Some of the skills I’ve developed since I started my journey are Python, R, SQL, Google Script and in-depth knowledge of cloud-based services such as Amazon S3, EC2 and Redshift, Google BigQuery and visualisation tools/libraries such as PowerBI and ggplot2/matplotlib libraries.
